name: Dodgy Cube
description:
Dodgy Cube is a fast-paced 3d platformer of sorts, with some really simple but nice graphics. Use the "A" and "D" keys to move the cube, and "P" to pause the game! remember this will get very hard :D

LOOKING FOR MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS IF YOU HAVE SOME POST IN THE COMMENTS

Fun fact it's the first game I have developed

Demo

And We Have Liftoff The Demo Is Now Out!

Demo Features

10 Levels!

You get to play new levels!

You will be the first on to the play new updates!

Hopefully, You Will Enjoy The Demo!

Price

When the full game is released it will be pay what you want!

Know Bugs

The Fog Make The Platform Look Like Its Disappearing (Thanks To The Mouth For Finding This Bug)

if you find any more bugs please tell me and ill try to update the game as fast as possible
